sect1.title: What is Gaim
sect1.para: Gaim is the default instant messenger client in Ubuntu. With Gaim you can talk to people who use: AIM/ICQ, Gadu-Gadu, GroupWise, IRC, Jabber, MSN, Napster and Yahoo. The ability to use one client instead of multiple is a great benefit and allows you to have all of your buddies in one window so you can just click a name and talk. We will go over the different sections of Gaim and how to set it up to your liking.
